attributes.action: Block the UK Govt from giving any money to the EU after 2019 when art 50 expires
attributes.additional_details:
Over 40 years we have paid in £billions which has been squandered, used on vanity projects or used for "even further integration" without any consultation from our Government.
It is time for this to stop so that we can truly leave the EU.
attributes.background:
We want a full BREXIT and an end to freedom of movement. 
We want an exit from the customs union and free market. 
When the end of the 2 year article 50 period expires in 2019 we want to be able to control immigration and negotiate trade deals with countries outside of the EU.
